content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ETCD
      operator: equal_to
      value: UNPLAN
    - name: TAETORD
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000020
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when ETCD="UNPLAN" and TAETORD is not null.
Outcome:
  Message: TAETORD should be null when ETCD = 'UNPLAN'.
  Output Variables:
    - ETCD
    - TAETORD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0206
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: TAETORD will not be populated for subject Elements
                  that are not planned for the Arm to which the subject was assigned.
                  Thus, TAETORD will not be populated for any Element with an ETCD
                  value of UNPLAN.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 6
                Section: '5.3'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - SE

json.Description: Raise an error when ETCD="UNPLAN" and TAETORD is not null.

Outcome.Message: TAETORD should be null when ETCD = 'UNPLAN'.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: TAETORD will not be populated for subject Elements that are not planned for the Arm to which the subject was assigned. Thus, TAETORD will not be populated for any Element with an ETCD value of UNPLAN.
